N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7013.11 - Staff training

State Regulations
(a) The
chief administrative officer shall ensure that appropriate facility staff
receive orientation to current facility policies and procedures relating to
classification. (b) All facility
staff assigned to perform duties related to the administration and
implementation of classification shall be trained in facility classification
policies and procedures that pertain to their area(s) of
responsibility. (c) All facility
staff assigned to perform duties related to the administration and
implementation of classification procedures pursuant to sections
7013.7, 7013.8 and
7013.9
of this Part shall be
trained in classification theory and techniques by completing a training
program approved by the commission. Only facility staff who have completed such
training shall perform duties related to the administration and implementation
of classification procedures. Notes
